entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InlineArray fails at runtime when declared as a ref struct. #71058
  • Handling of argument caching in `GetUnderlyingIndexerOrSliceAccess` is inconsistent #71056
  • Compiler is too strict with its requirements for collection-expression code-gen when targeting an interface. #71054
  • Make code action's nested actions publicly accessible #71050

Closed

  • IDE0028 and IDE0300 suggest using collection expressions inside expression trees #71012
    17.9
  • Publish symbols for MSBuildHost #70987
    17.9
  • Add a SourceText.GetContentHash function that produces a hash fingerprint for a file based solely on content. #70752
  • Equals sign (`=`) no longer valid in a project name with .net8.0 #71022
  • Add support for respecting custom configured severity settings in editorconfig #52991
    17.9
  • Flaky test SearchGraphQueryTests_NavigateTo.SearchForMember #70994
  • 'AvoidConstArraysFixer' encountered an error and has been disabled. #71042
  • IDE Refactoring for IDE0032 (Use auto property) produces unhelpful/invalid fix #71032
  • Unable to use `nameof` in property: attribute in a record's primary constructor #71005
    17.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow ms time sums to be long instead of just int. #71060
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add some more incremental generator docs #71059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Insert release/dev17.9 to rel branch #71057
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Cancel the request to copilot when typing start #71055
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Offer use-primary-constructor on abtract types with protected constructors #71053
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move background initialization to OnAfterPackageLoadedAsync #71047
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Prioritize Obsolete attribute over siblings #71043
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9

Merged

  • Do not offer 'use collection expression' inside expression trees. #71026
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure we publish symbols for the BuildHost #71051
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Clarify logic for nav-to searching. #71052
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Properly escape ref path names that contain equals #71038
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix flakey issue with stale/cached/incomplete progression results #71045
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch IDE0005 from WarningLevel to AnalysisLevel #70821
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • IDE changes for respecting code style severity from 'option_name = option_value:severity' entries in command line builds #69844
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Don't offer to introduce constants in attributes for things that can't be attributes. #71044
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix use-auto-prop with init-properties #71040
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Support implicit indexer access in object initializers #70649
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, untriaged
  • Unnecessary directives #70251
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix exception in PackageSettingsPersister #71027
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Utilize IVsAsyncFileChangeEx2 #70936
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update `features/roles` with latest bits from `main` branch #70874
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update to vs-extension-testing 0.1.184-beta #70960
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reset loop head state when local function starting state changes #71009
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Draft - testing out new API to get semantic model with nullability analysis disabled #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Emit `readonly.` for constrained array access #70949
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
